description: Experiment API for interacting with Thunderbird task lists.

functions.name: getTaskLists
functions.description: Retrieves the available task lists (calendars supporting tasks).

functions.name: createTask
functions.description: Creates a new task in the specified list.

parameters.name: listId
parameters.description: The ID of the calendar/task list.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title or subject of the task.

parameters.name: dueDateStr
parameters.description: The due date in ISO 8601 format.
